ygData.subject: Re: Woodelf Hide Skill
ygData.msgSnippet: I may be incorrect, but: Hiding is one of those skills where you don t know if you re successful. You think you re hiding, but you really can t jump to a third
ygData.messageBody:
I may be incorrect, but:
Hiding is one of those skills where you don't know if you're successful. You think you're hiding, but you really can't jump to a third person view to make sure. I have a dark elf character and I like to use hiding quite a bit. I 'always' disapear off the screen (because I think I'm really hiding!)
Also I don't think the message says "you are hidden" but rather "you begin to hide" or something like that.
---

_______________________________
Ozimandias
oziman@...

On Mon, 17 May 1999 15:37:02 The Last Knight wrote:
>From: The Last Knight <knight@...>
>
>
>Greetings All,
>
>
> I have a question to all you woodland elves out there. Woodelves have the
>born-with-skill to Hide. However, when I was watching them play with
>Hide (they were lvl4-6), I could still see them. On their screen they were
>hidden and they can nolonger see their character, but I can see them plainly.
>
> Once in awhile I see them disappear, but most of the time I still see them
>even though they said they got the message "you are hidden" and they can
>no longer see themselves in any camera view.
>
> Is this a bug, are they doing something wrong, or do Humans have a chance
>of seeing them even though they are hidden from other eyes?
>
>Thanks,
> //Aldaren the Human, woodelf spotting, cleric
>
>
